1060830.name: Heretic Operative - Blood Cult
1060830.description:
Another Cult rises to threaten the Northern Reach! The Blood Cult is an expansion for Heretic Operative that adds an new, difficult Cult Deck to use in the game.

Commanding the gruesome power of unfettered Blood magic, these Cultists present a serious challenge to the Heretics.

  • Blood Cultists are largely immune to physical damage.
  • Blood Cult sites can destroy your allies, replacing them with doppleganger Cultists.
  • 20 new Enemy cards to challenge your skills. Late-game enemy cards are extremely difficult, requiring an aggressive pace to stay out of danger.

The Blood Cult will unlock upon reaching level 2 (after finishing the introductory game), and is usable in combination with all Story Decks and Operatives.

Can you survive the horrors of the Blood Cult?
1060830.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
